sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import { useLocation, useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom'; const Invoice = () => { const location = useLocation(); const navigate = useNavigate(); const { from, to, date, busId, name, email, phone, seats, selectedSeats, paymentDetails } = location.state || {}; const invoiceNumber = `INV${Math.floor(Math.random() * 1000000)}`; const currentDate = new Date().toLocaleDateString(); const handlePrint = () => { window.print(); }; return (
{/* Print Header - Hidden in print */}

Invoice

{/* Invoice Content */}
{/* Company Header */}

RedBus

123 Travel Street

Mumbai, India 400001

support@redbus.com

Invoice

Invoice #: {invoiceNumber}

Date: {currentDate}

{/* Customer Details */}

Customer Details

Name:

{name}

Email:

{email}

Phone:

{phone}

{/* Journey Details */}

Journey Details

From:

{from}

To:

{to}

Date:

{date}

Bus ID:

{busId}

Number of Seats:

{seats}

Seat Numbers:

{selectedSeats.sort((a, b) => a - b).join(', ')}

{/* Payment Details */}

Payment Details

Payment Method:

{paymentDetails?.method || 'Card'}

Payment Date:

{new Date(paymentDetails?.timestamp || Date.now()).toLocaleDateString()}

Amount Paid:

₹{paymentDetails?.amount || '999'}

Status:

Paid

{/* Footer */}

Thank you for choosing RedBus!

For any queries, please contact our support team.

); }; export default Invoice;
